name: TaborHelper
0: ”Alexa, ask Tabor Help for a fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tabor help
des: This skill allows you to enhance your Tabor experience by allowing Alexa to respons Tabor related questions. The intelligent helper will know be able to inform its user of what class he/she must attend, fun facts about the school, and answer more specific questions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
